alert.note: Alert for Banks; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 10:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Banks, southeastern Hall and northern Jackson Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1008 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Gainesville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Lula, Maysville, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Candler, Pinefield Crossroads, Hollingsworth and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
